name: glottal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or produced by the glottis (= an opening in the throat that is closed when you swallow or make particular sounds): The only thing to stop the glottal spasms is a muscle relaxant. This glottal plosive is formed by closing the glottis completely (bringing the vocal cords into contact) then suddenly opening it. See also
glottis
glottal stop
More examplesFewer examples"Well," said the president in a strangely glottal tone.Glottal aperture may affect pitch, interacting in complex ways with airflow.The Xhosa languages are unique in using glottal clicks.
